short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the current gas price using your preferred gas price provider.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows current gas price estimates from FTMScan to help better estimate gas needed for a transaction on the Fantom blockchain in MetaMask (for example)
